e="preserve">Sam Beazley (29 March 1916 – 12 June 2017) was a British actor. He began acting as a teenager in the 1930s. He appeared with John Gielgud in productions of "Hamlet" (1934) and "Romeo and Juliet" (1935).
He returned to acting when he was 75. Since then has appeared in a variety of stage and movie productions. In his 90s, he became a painter. He was known for his role as Everard in "Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix" (2007).
Beazley died on 12 June 2017 at the age of 101.
